message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.CR 

The paper deals with communication and networking in cellular networks, which falls under the scope of cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The use of D2D communication and device relaying involves information theory concepts, making cs.IT (Information Theory) a likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a communication scheme, which involves system design and control, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) another possible sub-category. The use of D2D communication and device relaying also has implications for multimedia applications, making cs.MM (Multimedia) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the impact of D2D on fairness among users, which involves security and privacy concerns, making cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) a possible sub-category.
